updateDynamicLPFee((address,address,addr.details: Some of the use case could be:   1) when hook#beforeSwap() is called and hook call this function to update the lp fee   2) For BinPool only, when hook#beforeMint() is called and hook call this function to update the lp fee   3) other use case where the hook might want to on an ad-hoc basis increase/reduce lp fee
